text: Hit Man is a 1982 Spanish Mexican action movie. It was directed by José Antonio de la Loma. Actors include George Peppard, Max von Sydow, Jorge Rivero, Maud Adams, and Chuck Connors. ==Other websites== *Hit Man at IMDb Category:1982 action movies Category:Mexican action movies Category:Spanish action movies Category:Movies directed by José Antonio de la Loma
title: Hit Man (movie)
